description2: Below, you will find answers to the most frequently asked questions.

depositMoney.cryptoInfo: Attention! Cryptocurrency payments must be made using the Ethereum network. Using other networks for cryptocurrency payments will result in a loss of funds.

toFindYourSteamTradeUrl: To find your Steam Trade URL
tradeUrlInfo: The Steam Trade URL is an exchange link for trading items on steam.  The Provided trade URL cannot belong to any other user.
balanceQuestionMark: Gold coins are additional currency in our service. They allow you to open cases in the gold area section.
freeGold.title: Free Gold
completePreviousTask: Complete the previous task to unlock the next one
verifyDescription: We are verifying your task, come back here in a while
taskQuestionMark: Verifying your task can take up to 24 hours, and in some cases a little longer.
taskEmailModal.description1: Enter your email address and then head to your inbox to verify it
taskEmailModal.description2: Provide the verification code from your email
taskEmailModal.description3: We are verifying your assignment, come back here in some time
taskScreenshotModal.title: Task completion confirmation
taskScreenshotModal.description1: The screenshot should show the entire screen, and the completed task must be clearly visible. any attempted cheating will be punished with the rejection of prizes and a ban with no possibility of appeal.
taskScreenshotModal.error.fileIsTooLarge: The file is too large, the maximum size is 2048kb
taskCasinoModal.enterTheUidOfYourAccount: Enter the uid of your account
taskCasinoModal.step1: Install one night casino on your phone
taskCasinoModal.step2: Go to your profile, there is a uid code above the avatar, which should be entered in the field below
taskCasinoModal.step3: Choose edit profile (notebook graphics in the lower left corner)
taskCasinoModal.step5: After transferring to the browser, select "log in"
taskCasinoModal.step10: Go to your profile, there is a uid code above the avatar, which should be entered in the field below
taskCasinoModal.step11: Click „get started” to complete the task
taskSimpleModal.title: Confirmation of task completion
taskSimpleModal.description: Make sure you have completed this task and click the redeem button
